## R for big data

Machine Learning is often used for dealing with big data. 

I quite like this graph because it shows how many different packages can be used for big data. 

Hence, it is quite impossible to know everything. 

General understanding of machine learning is often good enough for psychologists. 

But I will try to be as in-depth as possible. 

More to come soon!
